text: Donnie Gerald Green (July 21, 1948 â€“ August 28, 2019) was an American football offensive lineman in the National Football League. He played for the Buffalo Bills, Philadelphia Eagles, and the Detroit Lions. He played college football at Purdue University and was drafted in the fifth round of the 1971 NFL Draft. He was born in Washington, D.C.. On August 28, 2019, Green died on August 28, 2019 at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Washington, D.C. title: Donnie Green
